attributes.action: Appoint an Adult Mental Health Ambassador and Adult Mental Health Group
attributes.additional_details:
If the Government are taking advice in relation to youth mental health they should also consider adult mental health.
 
There is a Mental Health in Education Action Group which the Youth Ambassador sits on and we believe there is a need for there to be an action group in relation to adult mental health also.
attributes.background:
Mental health and the lack of a joined up approach and timely services is a major issue.
 
The Government has appointed a Youth Mental Health Ambassador - so the importance and impact of such a role is already realised. We believe there should also be an Adult Mental Health Ambassador.
